name: Mail Delivery!
description:
The mail service is flooded with delayed mails! Its up to you to drive through the city and deliver all the mails on time!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Drive through the city

-Get to all the objectives

-Once done, go back to the mail office to get more mail cards to deliver

-Number of Rounds: 7-

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W/A - Accelerate/Reverse

A/D - Steer

E - Car Horn

ESC - Pause
